ygData.subject: RE: [EQ_Tinkering] Digest Number 354
ygData.msgSnippet: No kidding! How about something that anyone could use and would actually buy! Maybe a tinkered corpse locator or a clockwork sword with ranged attack spell
ygData.messageBody:
No kidding! How about something that anyone could use
and would actually buy! Maybe a tinkered corpse
locator or a clockwork sword with ranged attack spell
charges or something. I do like the pet idea I've been
wondering when we'd be able to build clockwork spiders
or rats or heaven forbid a clockwork gnome.

--- "Kimes, Dean W." <dean_kimes@...>
wrote:
> Yeah like a lvl 12-16 pet would be unbalancing. You
> can already get all the
> lvl 12 fire pets you want from Upper Guk, why would
> having one that was
> tinkered with charges be a problem?
>
> -----Original Message-----
> From: Tom Magrino [mailto:lord_wire@...]
> Sent: Friday, February 09, 2001 3:28 PM
> To: EQ_Tinkering@yahoogroups.com
> Subject: Re: [EQ_Tinkering] Digest Number 354
>
>
> Lol! Being a Gnome Wizard who tinkers in this game
> just keeps getting worse and worse. You would think
> that by now they would at least have put more than a
> few tinkering items in the game that are actually
> useful. *sigh*
>
> Hexer Winzig
> 55 wizard
> 129 tinkerer
>
